title: VPN
body: So i was wondering can i play league whit a VPN or is it banable bc when i login whit a VPN i dont get the "Disconected from pvp.net timed out" error so i just want to know is it bannable or can it cause some issues !

replies.body:
No, using a VPN is fine. It doesn't give you a competitive advantage, and really all it's doing is forcing your connection to take a different route to our servers. If you'd like, we can try to get to the bottom of your issue reaching our servers without a VPN so you don't have to continue to use one. If you'd like to do this, the first step I recommend taking is ensuring all your local network settings are compatible with our [**connection guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) If this doesn't fix the issue, don't worry, we can troubleshoot further. :)

Please let me know if you encounter further issues with this.

I can vouch for this as it was recommended to me by a Support specialist and I have been using a VPN for about 1 year now.

I will tell you that the only way a VPN actually can help with connection is if there is a bad hop you can bypass otherwise it won't help.
